meaningMnemonic: An <kanji>old woman</kanji> is who this is. Then, you add ちゃん for the name ender. You add お to be nicer. This person is a <vocabulary>granny</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>grandma</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>old lady</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>old woman</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading isn't the ば you learned with the kanji. It's a slightly longer ばあ, because you gotta be nice, you know? Also, the person you thought was a <vocabulary>granny</vocabulary> is actually a sheep. <reading>Baaaa</reading>! (ばあ).
